page.title: 07LITTLEHAMPTON TOWN
page.content: Over the years Littlehampton has not changed much at all.In fact it is rather surprising just how much of the old town still remains.The eastern half of East street was as it is today,and is still recognisable for instance the cornerstones were there.There was a block of houses on the site of the cinema which was built in 1927. there was a tailors shop where the card centre is today and a supply stores,a wine merchants and a china shop where a supermarket now stands.A bank now stands where there was a hotel and the local jobcentre stands upon the site of a shoe and boat shop. The newsagent known as the "cabin" stands upon the site of an old cottage called "Swiss cottage".The Dolphin hotel is still there, a building which was erected in 1873.
